text: Le Triomphe de l'amour is the second solo album by French experimental singer and composer Areski Belkacem (his ninth overall), released in 2010 on the Universal Music Group label. It is his first solo album in four decades, having instead collaborated with Brigitte Fontaine in the meantime. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2010 albums Category:Areski Belkacem albums
title: Le Triomphe de l'amour (album)
